spec.rawSql:
SELECT 
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM to_timestamp(ht.clock))::bigint * 1000 AS time,
    (json_data->>'processo')::varchar(100) AS processo,
    (json_data->>'cpu')::numeric(10,2) AS "value"
FROM history_text ht
INNER JOIN items i ON i.itemid = ht.itemid
INNER JOIN hosts h ON h.hostid = i.hostid
CROSS JOIN LATERAL jsonb_array_elements(
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ht.value, E'\r', ''), E'\n', ''), E'\t', ''), E'\Z', '')::jsonb
) AS json_data
WHERE h.name = '$VM'
AND i.name = 'Consumo de CPU por Processos'
AND ht.clock > $__unixEpochFrom()
AND ht.clock < $__unixEpochTo()
AND json_data->>'cpu' ~ '^[0-9]+(\.[0-9]+)?$' 
AND (json_data->>'cpu')::numeric(10,2) >= 0 -- Garante que o valor pode ser convertido em número
